title: The Four Horsemen - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/8/19
itunes:title: The Four Horsemen - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/8/19
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar Ken Klein discuss his theories on the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse mentioned in the Book of Revelation, whether there will be false prophets before the end of the world, and if the decline of America is a warning the end is near.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
